SELECT s.*, t.teacher_name FROM t_stage as s left JOIN t_teacher_stage as ts ON s.id = ts.stage_id JOIN t_teacher as t ON ts.teacher_id = t.id WHERE s.is_valid = 1
and s.id = #{id}

and t.teacher_name like concat('%',#{teacherName},'%')
select id,stage_name from t_stage where is_valid = 1
select s.id from t_stage s where s.stage_name =#{stageName} and is_valid = 1
select t.id id,t.teacher_name teacherName from t_teacher as t left join t_teacher_role as tr on t.id = tr.teacher_id left join t_role r on r.id=tr.role_id where r.role_name="授课老师"

SELECT t.stage_name cname, DATEDIFF( t.update_date, t.create_date ) td, COUNT(s.id) stusum FROM t_stage t LEFT JOIN t_student_stage sc ON t.id = sc.stage_id LEFT JOIN t_student s ON s.id = sc.student_id GROUP BY t.id
select t.id,t.stage_name name,COUNT(s.id) value from t_stage t left join t_student_stage sc on t.id = sc.stage_id left join t_student s on sc.student_id = s.id GROUP BY t.id
select st.*, t.id as t_id, t.teacher_name from t_stage as st left join t_teacher_stage as ts on st.id = ts.stage_id left join t_teacher t on ts.teacher_id = t.id where st.id = #{id}
